Plot: The Pink Cupcake Truck is here! From USA TODAY Bestselling Author Harper Lin When Amelia gets her pink cupcake truck a spot at the town's popular food festival, she puts herself in the middle of another murder investigation. The mayor is poisoned after trying some of the food for the cameras, and the creepy hotdog vendor next to Amelia's truck is Detective Dan's main suspect. However, a lot of people want the mayor deadâ€”his jilted ex-wife, his staff, the corrupt businessmen, townspeople he's screwed over... how is Amelia supposed to get to figure out the real killer AND keep her cupcake business afloat? Find out in the 3rd novella (30,000 words) in The Pink Cupcake Mysteries .
